name: 陳文輝
objective:
The goal of this course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics and ubiquitous computing by reading and discussing recent literature.

因老師請假至日本參加會議，9/13當天不用上課，補課時間另行通知。
